summary: I am a seasoned HR leader with a proven track record of establishing and optimizing HR functions in both remote and hybrid work environments. I specialize in HR strategy, people operations, performance management, talent acquisition, and organizational transformation. Whether building HR systems from scratch or managing restructures, I bring a people-first, compliance-conscious approach that fosters scalable business growth. My work spans sectors including social enterprise, engineering marketing, fitness, and administrative services.
driving_culture_description: With a Master's in Human Resources Management and extensive experience across Fortune 500 companies, I specialize in creating environments where both employees and organizations thrive.
keyPoints: Expert in talent acquisition and retention strategies
Skilled in employee relations and conflict resolution
Proficient in HR analytics and data-driven decision making
Certified in HR management and leadership
